message: I propose we divide the money with a 70/30 split in favor of you, Bob. Remember, with each round, the money becomes less valuable for me.
I think we can both do better.  I'm offering a 80/20 split in my favor.  Remember, with each round, the money becomes less valuable for both of us.
Considering the inflation, I suggest we split the money equally. This way, both of us receive the same value regardless of the decreasing worth of money in subsequent rounds.
